about.title: About the Engineer
about.headline: I AM A SOFTWARE ENGINEER WITH A PASSION FOR NURTURING GROWTH IN CODE AND LIFE.
description: Hi, I’m Abhishek. My journey began in a hometown garden, where I learned the value of nurturing growth both in life and in my career. Just as in gardening, I approach my work with curiosity, always learning, adapting, and striving to make things grow.

I thrive on finding the right solutions to make everything click, and I take pride in building strong relationships with the people I work with. For me, growth is just as much about helping others succeed as it is about achieving my own goals.
Full-Stack Developer leveraging React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and Nest.js.
Building scalable solutions and integrating AI/ML capabilities.
Collaborating on innovative projects in a dynamic environment.
Increased meeting booking success rate by 20% by reducing friction in the scheduling API and refining prompt-based intent detection.
Designed and built marketplace app with APIs integrating GoHighLevel, Zapier, and Make, boosting product adoption by 30% per customer.
Automated document ingestion (PDF, DOC, Images) using Azure Form Recognizer, enhancing product efficiency and accuracy by 50%.
Developed robust report generation APIs in Node.js for the voice agent platform, empowering customers with in-depth analysis of their AI agent usage and performance.
Boosted software development capacity by resolving a critical MFA issue, enabling faster product releases.
Improved data migration speed and accuracy by over 40% through Python automation scripts.
Managed and audited the merging of over 10,000 reports, ensuring secure SFTP delivery via GoAnywhere with PGP encryption.
Facilitated seamless integration and functionality within the Tableau ecosystem through team collaboration.
Fostered a culture of code efficiency, enhancing collaboration and product quality.
Developed web applications using React.js/Next.js, Typescript, Node.js, and MongoDB/PostgreSQL to create scalable systems.
Collaborated with the team to design and implement micro-services architecture, load balancing, and Docker for a resilient system.
Automated video generation from user data with an ae-script for Adobe After Effects, increasing content production efficiency.
Integrated customization tools for Scentcraft's platform to enhance user experience and enable personalized fragrances creation.
Enhanced the onboarding process for influencers by developing a web application using React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Tolstoy APIs, improving user experience and operational efficiency.
